transcript:
Customer: Mere tan man dhadkan mein piya ram.
Executive: Haan ji Vijay ji. Hello, haan ji captain sir.
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Captain sir wo Suji aapko call kar rahi hai, aap time hi nahi de rahe unko sir.
Customer: Are yaar time nahi mil raha hai yaar, bahut time busy chal raha hu main.
Executive: Wo abhi do teen baar call laga ke sir ek baar aap call laga ke uthate ho meri baat karvao.
Customer: Are ab main nikla hu yaar, abhi yaha se nikla hu main thoda kaam se.
Executive: Subah aap video meeting pe aane ke liye keh rahe the, to ek baar bata dete sir kab tak aayenge video meeting pe.
Customer: Subah to aaj nahi ho payega, main thoda wo bhi bahar. Haan ji, kya keh rahe ho? Out of state ja raha hu thoda kaam se.
Executive: Out of state ja rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan thoda kaam se nikla hu.
Executive: To wapsi kab tak aaoge aap?
Customer: Wapsi parso.
Executive: Parso? Haan. To sir ek kaam kare jo aapne matlab char din se na concern raise ho rakha hai, agar aap kaho to main concern.
Customer: Suji ko bol dijiye Suji phone kar lenge Suji kar denge 11 baje.
Executive: Haan ji, kya keh rahe ho?
Customer: Suji ko bol dijiye aaj kal aana Suji phone karna Suji kar denge 11 baje.
Executive: Kya phone kar rahe hai aapko?
Customer: Suji 11 baje kar denge, main 11 baje phone karna hai.
Executive: Kal, kal, kal 11 baje.
Customer: Haan kal, kal.
Executive: Sir 11 baje video meeting rakhhe aapke sath.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir kal 11 baje ki video meeting rakhhe aapke sath.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Done, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not giving time to Suji.

- Customer has a concern raised for 4 days.



Resolution:

- Video meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 11 AM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, concern, follow-up
